definition: the Double Ninth Festival (9th day of the 9th lunar month)

sentences.english: Visiting this time we, the Chongjiudegao should be inverted the old customs.
sentences.chinese: 我們這一次秋遊，倒應了重九登高的舊俗。

sentences.english: Thus, the ninth day of the ninth lunar month is called Double-Positive or Double-Nine.
sentences.chinese: 因此，九月初九被稱作重陽或重九。

definition: Dragon Boat Festival (5th day of 5th lunar month)
Double Ninth or Yang Festival/9th day of 9th lunar month
second month of autumn/8th month of the lunar calendar
Double Ninth or Yang Festival/9th day of 9th lunar month
first year of the sixty-year cycle (where each year is numbered with one of the 10 heavenly stems 天干[tian1 gan1] and one of the 12 earthly branches 地支[di4 zhi1])/the sixty-year cycle
the full moon/the fifteenth day of each lunar month
Ghost Festival on 15th day of 7th lunar month when offerings are made to the deceased
the last days of the year/old age
